name: Widdit
tag_list: monetize-website, free, add-ons, search, toolbars, applications, publishers, developers, websites, installer, keywords, content-management, monetization, k
overview:
Widdit provides publishers and developers the ability to establish an interactive online experience for their users that is personal, productive and fun through one designated platform.

Widdit’s innovating tools like HomeTab and HomeBase can be used on both the PC and mobile ecosystems. Widdit promotes publishers’ top content and features, providing higher engagement levels on all platforms.

While users enjoy easier and quicker search options, publishers also benefit from comprehensive insights and analytic reports that illustrate user search habits across the web and mobile browsing activities.

Currently Widdit’ is being utilized by thousands of small, medium and large sized publishers and developers, powering millions of monthly interactions for over 60 million users.

HomeTab HomeTab is a dynamic browser add-on that transforms the generic homepage into a highly personalized platform. With HomeTab, users can create a connection between their browser and mobile device. After the connection is made, they can control their device remotely. Features include reading and responding to SMS, see pictures taken by the phone on the big screen and recieve phone calls directly from their browser.

HomeTab will also utilize smartphone attributes like GPS and serach history to deliver unique recommendations and smart predictions taylor made for the user.

HomeBase A Unique and innovative Android SDK that can be integrated with any app on the Play Store. HomeBase offers a fully customizable lock screen that includes custom RSS feeds, Push notifications, Widgets, social feeds and much more. By integrating HomeBase, app developers can montize their apps and increase their engagement level while delivering a new, user oriented product.

milestones.description: Unveiling of Widdit – the fresh new re-branding of PredictAd that takes completion tools for websites and user applications to a new level of cool accessibility
